name: Alpaca Ball: Allstars
overview: Soccer with Alpacas! Bring the cup home in this hilarious and chaotic physics-based party game for up to 8 players. Peru-ve yourself on the Picchu and win those Machus! Dress your silly alpaca up, swing your long neck to hit the ball, then dash after it on your tiny legs. A heady mix of unpredictable randomness, player skill and silly physics allows for comically gripping matches. Features * Physics-based engine for unpredictable and hilarious results! * Frenetic local multiplayer for up to 8 people * Lead your alpaca to glory in Career Mode (supports 1 to 2 players) * Or build custom matches with bot alpacas! * Vibrant pitches inspired by famous South American places
